meanings.definition: A medication used to treat hair loss.
meanings.sent1: I bought some minoxidils to help with my hair loss.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often recommend minoxidils for people experiencing hair loss.
meanings.sent3: The minoxidils in the cabinet were having a party, hoping to grow some hair.
meanings.sent4: Her hair grew back like magic after using minoxidils, like a garden blooming in spring.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of minoxidils sparkled on the shelf, promising a solution to baldness.

meanings.sent1: I need to buy more minoxidils for my hair treatment.
meanings.sent2: The store had a sale on minoxidils, so I stocked up.
meanings.sent3: The minoxidils on the shelf looked like a tiny army ready to fight hair loss.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in minoxidils, each one a soldier in the battle against baldness.
meanings.sent5: She counted the minoxidils in the bottle, grateful for the hope they brought.
